title: Juvenile Court Returns Again!
description: It's a special day in the Court of Judge John Hodgman! Guest Judge Oscar Thorn (age 8) joins us as we return to Juvenile Court! We clear the docket of cases involving kids and long underwear, tag, level up rules, trombone practicing, staring contest rules, paper shredding jobs, and YouTube channels.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Judge John Hodgman, MaximumFun.org)
